entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
